description: This file configures CORS mappings and Swagger API documentation for the event management backend in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: WebConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for setting up CORS and Swagger documentation.

methods.name: addCorsMappings
methods.description: Overrides default method to add CORS mappings allowing all origins, headers, and methods.

methods.name: api
methods.description: Defines the OpenAPI bean providing API metadata and external documentation.
